channel.title: Client loaded, but cannot connect
channel.description:
Ok, so I updated my client, all I did was change the name of the server because i miss spelled it in loader.java, and then i re jarred it because the co owner was having some issues with invisible ground and maps and stuff..
So now, when I open the new jar file, and even the run.bat in the client folder, the client loads, and it comes to the login screen, then when i go to log in it says "error connecting to server"
If it was not connecting to the source on the vps then it would usually just stay at connecting to server 1%, so I am just wondering if anyone knows how i can fix this?
Thanks.

item.title: Client loaded, but cannot connect
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:

Ok, so I updated my client, all I did was change the name of the server because i miss spelled it in loader.java, and then i re jarred it because the co owner was having some issues with invisible ground and maps and stuff…

If it was not connecting to the source on the vps then it would usually just stay at connecting to server 1%, so I am just wondering if anyone knows how i can fix this?
